view.template:
{% load view_tags %} {% load mathfilters %} {% load i18n %} {% get_current_language as LANGUAGE_CODE %} {% get_set 'project/dataset' as datasets %} {% get_number 'project/costs/creation/personnel' as creationp %} {% get_number 'project/costs/creation/non_personnel' as creationnp %} {% get_number 'project/costs/usage/personnel' as usagep %} {% get_number 'project/costs/usage/non_personnel' as usagenp %} {% get_number 'project/costs/storage/personnel' as storagep %} {% get_number 'project/costs/storage/non_personnel' as storagenp %} {% get_number 'project/costs/metadata/personnel' as metadatap %} {% get_number 'project/costs/metadata/non_personnel' as metadatanp %} {% get_number 'project/costs/pid/personnel' as pidp %} {% get_number 'project/costs/pid/non_personnel' as pidnp %} {% get_number 'project/costs/sensitive_data/anonymization/personnel' as anonymizationp %} {% get_number 'project/costs/sensitive_data/anonymization/non_personnel' as anonymizationnp %} {% get_number 'project/costs/sensitive_data/security/personnel' as securityp %} {% get_number 'project/costs/sensitive_data/security/non_personnel' as securitynp %} {% get_number 'project/costs/ipr/personnel' as iprp %} {% get_number 'project/costs/ipr/non_personnel' as iprnp %} {% get_number 'project/costs/preservation/personnel' as preservationp %} {% get_number 'project/costs/preservation/non_personnel' as preservationnp %} {% if LANGUAGE_CODE == "de" %}

Kostenübersicht

1. Datengröße

{% for dataset in datasets %} {% endfor %}
Datensatz Datengröße Zuwachsrate / Jahr
{% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id' %} {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/size/volume' %} {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/rate' %}

Laufzeit des Projekts : {% render_value 'project/schedule/project_start' %} bis {% render_value 'project/schedule/project_end' %}

In welchem Umfang werden Infrastrukturressourcen benötigt?: {% render_value 'project/dataset/usage_infrastructure' %}

2. Personal- und Sachkosten

Kategorie Personalkosten Sachkosten
Datenerhebung {% render_value 'project/costs/creation/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/creation/non_personnel' %}
Datennutzung {% render_value 'project/costs/usage/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/usage/non_personnel' %}
Datenspeicherung {% render_value 'project/costs/storage/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/storage/non_personnel' %}
Metadaten {% render_value 'project/costs/metadata/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/metadata/non_personnel' %}
Persistente Identifikatoren {% render_value 'project/costs/pid/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/pid/non_personnel' %}
Anonymisierung sensibler Daten {% render_value 'project/costs/sensitive_data/anonymization/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/sensitive_data/anonymization/non_personnel' %}
Sicherheitsmaßnahmen für sensible Daten {% render_value 'project/costs/sensitive_data/security/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/sensitive_data/security/non_personnel' %}
Urheber- und Schutzrechte {% render_value 'project/costs/ipr/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/ipr/non_personnel' %}
Langzeitarchivierung {% render_value 'project/costs/preservation/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/preservation/non_personnel' %}
Summe {{ creationp | addition:usagep | addition:storagep | addition:metadatap | addition:pidp | addition:anonymizationp | addition:securityp | addition:iprp | addition:preservationp }} PM {{ creationnp | addition:usagenp | addition:storagenp | addition:metadatanp | addition:pidnp | addition:anonymizationnp | addition:securitynp | addition:iprnp | addition:preservationnp }} Euro

Wie werden die Kosten für das Datenmanagement im Projekt aufgebracht? {% render_value 'project/costs/preservation/cover_how' %}

{% endif %} {% if LANGUAGE_CODE == "en" %}

2. Personnel and material costs

Category Personnel costs Material costs
Data collection {% render_value 'project/costs/creation/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/creation/non_personnel' %}
Data use {% render_value 'project/costs/usage/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/usage/non_personnel' %}
Data storage {% render_value 'project/costs/storage/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/storage/non_personnel' %}
Metadata {% render_value 'project/costs/metadata/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/metadata/non_personnel' %}
Persistent identifiers {% render_value 'project/costs/pid/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/pid/non_personnel' %}
Anonymising sensitive data {% render_value 'project/costs/sensitive_data/anonymization/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/sensitive_data/anonymization/non_personnel' %}
Security measures for sensitive data {% render_value 'project/costs/sensitive_data/security/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/sensitive_data/security/non_personnel' %}
Copyright and property rights {% render_value 'project/costs/ipr/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/ipr/non_personnel' %}
Long-term archiving {% render_value 'project/costs/preservation/personnel' %} {% render_value 'project/costs/preservation/non_personnel' %}
Total {{ creationp | addition:usagep | addition:storagep | addition:metadatap | addition:pidp | addition:anonymizationp | addition:securityp | addition:iprp | addition:preservationp }} PM {{ creationnp | addition:usagenp | addition:storagenp | addition:metadatanp | addition:pidnp | addition:anonymizationnp | addition:securitynp | addition:iprnp | addition:preservationnp }} Euro
